description: Rep. John Moolenaar has requested an urgent briefing from the White House after Trump supported a deal giving Americans a majority stake in TikTok

title: European Defense Ministers Agree to Press on With 'Drone Wall' Project as Airspace Violations Mount
description: European defense ministers have agreed to develop a “drone wall” along their borders with Russia and Ukraine to better detect, track and intercept drones violating Europe’s airspace

title: Judge Approves $1.5 Billion Copyright Settlement Between AI Company Anthropic and Authors
description: A federal judge on Thursday approved a $1.5 billion settlement between artificial intelligence company Anthropic and authors who allege nearly half a million books had been illegally pirated to train chatbots

title: Trump Signs Executive Order Supporting Proposed Deal to Put TikTok Under US Ownership
description: President Donald Trump has signed an executive order declaring that a proposed deal allowing TikTok to continue operating in the United States will be a qualified sale that meets national security concerns laid out by the law

title: Instagram's 'Deliberate Design Choices' Make It Unsafe for Teens Despite Meta Promises, Report Says
description: Despite years of congressional hearings, academic research, whistleblowers and testimony from parents and teenagers about the harms of Instagram, Meta’s wildly popular app has failed to protect children with its “woefully ineffective” safety measures, according to a new report from former employee and whistleblower Arturo Bejar and four nonprofit groups

title: Russia Is Tracking Two Satellites Used by the German Military, Defense Minister Says
description: Russia is currently tracking two satellites used by the German military, according to German Defense Minister Boris Pistorius

title: Apple Says EU's Sweeping Digital Rules Delay New Features for Europeans and Seeks Their Repeal
description: Apple wants the European Union to repeal its Digital Markets Act, arguing it delays new features like live translation for AirPods

title: Louisiana's $3B Power Upgrade for Meta Project Raises Questions About Who Should Foot the Bill
description: Meta is racing to construct its largest data center yet, a $10 billion facility in northeast Louisiana as big as 70 football fields and requiring more than twice the electricity of New Orleans

title: One Tech Tip: How to Move Your Music Library to Another Streaming Platform
description: Switching music streaming services can be daunting, but there are ways to transfer your library

title: YouTube to Start Bringing Back Creators Banned for COVID-19 and Election Misinformation
description: YouTube will offer creators a way to rejoin the streaming platform if they were banned for violating COVID-19 and election misinformation policies that are no longer in effect

title: Man Arrested in UK Over Alleged Cyberattack That Affected European Airports
description: A man in his 40s has been arrested in southern England over an alleged cyberattack that disrupted several European airports, including London Heathrow

title: Al Gore's Satellite and AI System Is Now Tracking Sources of Deadly Soot Pollution
description: Former Vice President Al Gore has announced an expansion of Climate TRACE to track soot pollution using satellite technology and artificial intelligence

title: Optus Fined $66 Million for 'Appalling' Conduct in Sales to Telecom's Customers in Australia
description: An Australian judge has fined telecommunications giant Optus $66 million for unconscionable conduct under consumer law

title: Is AI a Threat to Jobs? A 'Tomb Raider' Affair Poses the Question
description: In France, the apparent use of artificial intelligence to clone an actor's voice for video game character Lara Croft has fans and actors up in arms

title: Europe Has a Russian Drone Problem. Here Are Ways It Could Be Solved
description: Estonia is extending a fence along its border with Russia and building anti-tank ditches and bunkers in preparation for a potential conflict with Moscow

title: AI's Double-Edged Sword: UN Leaders Weigh Its Promise and Peril
description: Artificial intelligence has taken center stage at the United Nations Security Council meeting

title: A Doomsday Prediction About the Rapture Is Spreading on TikTok
description: A South African man's prophecy about the Rapture has gone viral
